name: Tape-Build Mayhem
description:
The game has bugs and flaws! 

(maybe there will be updates)

In this game, you find yourself in a world of toys where all the toys want to kill you. Your objective is to build a car using materials you find in the game and drive it through the levels to reach the end.

A special object in the game is a sticky tape, which you must use to fasten the components of your car with it

As you progress through the levels, you will encounter various enemies, such as toy soldiers, horses, russian matryoshka doll and teddy bear. You must use your creativity and ingenuity to build a car that can overcome these challenges and make it to the end.

(A little plot): you have violated the system of this room and are trying to escape from it, but different toys will try to stop you

This game was developed by two friends for a Mini Jame Gam #16 in 3 days

Coder: robolohness

Visual: kemaxa

Have a good time!
